text: Kidnapping, Caucasian Style () is a 1967 Soviet comedy movie directed by Leonid Gaidai.Россияне назвали любимые роли Георгия ВицинаКавказская пленница, или Новые приключения Шурика It stars Aleksandr Demyanenko, Natalya Varley, and Vladimir Etush. ==Actors== *Aleksandr Demyanenko as Shurik *Natalya Varley as Nina (voiced by Nadezhda Rumyantseva) *Vladimir Etush as comrade Saakhov *Frunzik Mkrtchyan as Dzhabrail *Ruslan Akhmetov as Edik *Yuri Nikulin as the Fool *Georgy Vitsin as the Coward == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Gaidai
title: Kidnapping, Caucasian Style
